Your Idea into Reality

Whatever your dream, whatever your goal, I have the skills and experience to make it happen.

AJAX & Javascript Expert

Elance.com ranks me in the top 1% of AJAX developers and the top 5% of javascript developers worldwide. There's a reason they call me a javascript ninja.

I have been working with websites for 9 years. I have experience with literally hundreds of different sites and technologies.

I have two college degrees in Web development and Network Engineering. I am currently working on my third in Software Development at the University of Cincinnati School of Engineering.

Communication

I can communicate effectively and I listen to understand. I can work as a team member, a team leader, or a stand alone developer.

Competency

My skills include Backend Programming, User Interface Design and User Experience (UI & UX), Project Management, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Database Administration (DBA), and e-Commerce.

My focus is on the development aspects of a website, PHP, Java, Javascript / AJAX, MySQL. To compliment this, I have a large network of talented designers to work with.

I keep security at the highest priority while at the sametime using methods that do not inhibit the user. For example, I recieve no spam through my email address or contact form.
